Looking for professional video production in Athenry? Kraft Agency delivers comprehensive video services that help local businesses throughout East Galway tell their stories and achieve their marketing goals. From the historic town of Athenry to businesses across County Galway, we create video content that engages audiences, builds trust, and drives measurable business results.

Our video production expertise covers every aspect of content creation. Whether you need promotional videos to showcase your Athenry business, training and educational content, customer testimonials, social media videos, or corporate communications, our experienced team brings professional quality and creative vision to every project. We use cinema-grade equipment and proven production techniques to ensure your videos look polished, professional, and perfectly aligned with your brand identity.

Kraft Agency stands out by combining technical excellence with marketing strategy. We don't just produce beautiful videos – we create content engineered to achieve specific business objectives. Every video is optimized for your target platforms, whether that's YouTube, social media, your website, or email campaigns. With years of experience serving Athenry and East Galway businesses, professional equipment, and a commitment to delivering results, we're your trusted partner for video production that makes a real impact on your bottom line.

Video Production FAQs for Athenry Clients
Ready to Create Professional Video Content?

faq.question: Can you film at business locations in Athenry?
faq.answer: Yes! We regularly film on-site at client premises throughout Athenry and East Galway. We bring all necessary equipment and work efficiently to minimize any disruption to your business operations while capturing great footage.

faq.question: What types of videos work best for small businesses?
faq.answer: Popular options include business overview videos, customer testimonial videos, product or service demonstrations, social media content, and 'meet the team' videos. We'll recommend the best approach based on your goals and budget during consultation.

faq.question: How much does video production cost?
faq.answer: Costs start from €1,500 for simple social media videos, €3,000-€5,000 for professional business videos, and €8,000+ for comprehensive productions. We provide transparent quotes based on your specific requirements and work within various budgets.

faq.question: Do you provide scripts or do we need to write them?
faq.answer: We provide professional scriptwriting as part of our service. Our team can work from your ideas or develop concepts from scratch. We'll collaborate with you to ensure the script perfectly captures your message and brand voice.

faq.question: How long does the production process take?
faq.answer: Simple videos can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while more complex projects typically take 3-6 weeks from initial consultation to final delivery. We provide realistic timelines upfront and keep you updated throughout the process.

faq.question: Can you help promote our videos after production?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive video marketing services including YouTube optimization, social media advertising, email marketing integration, and analytics tracking to ensure your videos reach your target audience and drive results.

faq.question: What equipment do you use for filming?
faq.answer: We use professional cinema cameras, high-quality lenses, professional lighting kits, advanced audio recording equipment, gimbals and stabilizers, and industry-standard editing software to ensure broadcast-quality results.

faq.question: Do we own the final videos?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive complete copyright ownership and unlimited usage rights. We deliver files in all formats you need for unlimited use across websites, social media, advertising, presentations, or any other purpose.
